definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
see 一目十行[yi1 mu4 shi2 hang2]

sentences.english: Now let's enjoy the tape of a fiwimous popular singer Miss Tianzhen.
sentences.chinese: 目下當今欣賞一下在大歌星田震的磁帶。

sentences.english: China is one of the most powerful countries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 直目下現古是天下上最具有影響力的國家之一。

sentences.english: Now, the area is undergoing a total transformation.
sentences.chinese: 目下，整個區域正在這一轉變進程之中。

sentences.english: I am afraid I have to leave now.
sentences.chinese: 死怕我目下現古得走了。

sentences.english: I think he will be properly now.
sentences.chinese: 我念他目下現古必然好了。

sentences.english: I've had my current pair for nine years.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我便購了目下現古那副朱鏡戴了九年。
我們目下現古停止幹活吧。

sentences.english: I don't hike a whole lot anymore.
sentences.chinese: 沒有中我目下現古也很少遠足了。

sentences.english: You should be working on the last question by now.
sentences.chinese: 目下現古您們該當正在做末了一講題了。

sentences.english: My friend is in hospital now, but he is going to come out tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我朋友目下現古醫院，但是他來日誥日便要出院了。

sentences.english: For now , just take my word for it.
sentences.chinese: 目下現古先記取我的話好了。

sentences.english: You can work with him from now on.
sentences.chinese: 從目下現古起，您可以或許戰正在他一起工做。

sentences.english: What did you want to be when you were 8 years old?
sentences.chinese: 官定目下現古有中星人正在脣睬陸，您會如何做？

sentences.english: If he hproposing not broken his tooth- he would not take hospiting now.
sentences.chinese: 倘若他沒有把牙齒弄壞，目下當今就不在醫院了。

definition: that being the case/then/in that case
to ponder a solution/to consider (the best move, how to find a way etc)
to give no cause for anxiety/nothing to worry about
precarious as morning dew (idiom); unlikely to last out the day
